scripts.deploy-post: npm run build-post; npm run zip-post; npm run save-lambda-post
scripts.save-lambda-post: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name fnAnimalShelter2 --zip-file fileb://build/post.zip --profile codefellow
scripts.deploy-get: npm run build-get; npm run zip-get; npm run save-lambda-get
scripts.save-lambda-get: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name fnAnimalShelterGet --zip-file fileb://build/get.zip --profile codefellow
scripts.deploy-getIndex: npm run build-getIndex; npm run zip-getIndex; npm run save-lambda-getIndex
scripts.save-lambda-getIndex: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name fnAnimalShelterGetIndex --zip-file fileb://build/getIndex.zip --profile codefellow
scripts.deploy-delete: npm run build-delete; npm run zip-delete; npm run save-lambda-delete
scripts.save-lambda-delete: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name fnAnimalShelterDelete --zip-file fileb://build/delete.zip --profile codefellow
